title: exampledocs/books.json should use name instead of title
description: The file exampledocs/books.json currently contains two books. But they do not show up in the default solr/browse interface because they use "title" instead of "name", which the Velocity template does not show. Also we should include a few more books

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Attaching patch which changes title to name and adds two more books to the json file

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Attaching patch which renames title to name and adds two more books

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Planning for this to be my second commit to Lucene  What do you think?

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content: Note that if you click the "All" tab on JIRA, it will show your two commits (hence you don't need to bother to list the revisions if you don't want).
